```{r, echo=FALSE}
setwd("C:/Users/shjan/Documents/STA 141A")
set.seed(1)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
review_ratings = read.csv("google_review_ratings.csv", header = TRUE)[,-1]

clusters.1.2 <- review_ratings %>% select(Category.1, Category.2) %>%
  dist() %>% hclust(method = "average")

names(clusters.1.2)
plot(clusters.1.2)

review_ratings.all <- review_ratings %>% select(Category.1, 
                                               Category.2, 
                                               Category.3, 
                                               Category.4,
                                               Category.5,
                                               Category.6,
                                               Category.7,
                                               Category.8,
                                               Category.9,
                                               Category.10, 
                                               Category.11,
                                               Category.12,
                                               Category.13,
                                               Category.14,
                                               Category.15,
                                               Category.16,
                                               Category.17,
                                               Category.18,
                                               Category.19,
                                               Category.20,
                                               Category.21,
                                               Category.22,
                                               Category.23,
                                               Category.24)


clusters.all.f <- review_ratings.all %>%
  dist() %>% hclust(method = "average")

names(clusters.all.f)
plot(clusters.all.f)
```
